news.title: Average mortgage rate in USA rise to 6.95% in July 2024
news.para: When rates rise they can add hundreds of dollars a month in costs for borrowers. The elevated mortgage rates have been a major drag on home sales, which remain in a slump dating back to 2022.

news.title: Home sales in Toronto rise by 4.2% in June 2024
news.para: Seasonally adjusted sales rose by 4.2% in June from May, according to Toronto Regional Real Estate Board (TRREB) data. Average home prices increased by 1.8% to C$1.13 million ($830,000), the highest since December, while new listings were up 9.3%.

news.title: Spain to crack down on holiday rentals to address housing crisis
news.para: The government will investigate listings on platforms such as Airbnb and Booking.com to verify if they have licences, consumer rights minister Pablo Bustinduy said.

news.title: New Zealand to boost home construction with regulatory changes
news.para: While house prices have dropped from their 2021 peak, housing affordability remains low in New Zealand and rental prices are currently at record levels, making it a significant political issue.

news.title: Hong Kong will not sell commercial land in Q2 FY24 due to high vacancy rate
news.para: Vacancies in commercial sites are on the high side," Secretary for Development Bernadette Linn told a press conference, citing a vacancy rate of 13% estimated by realtors.

news.title: Cement sector sees marginal growth of 2-3% in Q1 FY25: Report
news.para: The sector has witnessed consolidation by leading players such as Aditya Birla group firm UltraTech Cement and Adani group firm Ambuja Cements.

news.title: Dalmia Bharat invests Rs 207 crore to add one MT at its Kadapa plant
news.para: The integrated cement manufacturing unit in Kadapa unit had an existing capacity of 2.6 MTPA. This expansion brings the company's total installed capacity to 46.6 MTPA, inclusive of its subsidiaries.

news.title: Haryana government allocates Rs 1,179 crore for infrastructure upgrade in all sectors
news.para: Residents, who have been opposing four-floor buildings, claimed their biggest concern is lack of key infrastructure — road, electricity, sewerage and drainage — which doesn’t support four dwelling units per plot.

news.title: Housing sales rise by 11% in first half of 2024: Knight Frank
news.para: Shishir Baijal, Chairman and Managing Director, Knight Frank India, said, "India's real estate market has been buoyant in the last few quarters owing to the strong economic fundamentals and stable socio-political conditions."

news.title: Uttar Pradesh government starts taking possession of land for Noida airport phase-II
news.para: Noida Airport's terminal construction faces delays due to fabrication issues, with a new completion date set for April 2025. Increased vendors aim to accelerate the process, sourcing steel from Chhattisgarh.

news.title: Bandra police file FIR against ex-employees for data theft impacting real estate firm
news.para: The police are investigating the matter based on the complaint, which states that the three suspects have joined a Powai-based real estate company after stealing the data.

news.title: Noida authority clears revised layouts for all Unitech projects
news.para: YS Malik mentions finalizing contractors for the work, with projects in Sectors 96, 97, 98 having refunds requested by homebuyers. Sector 113's Unihomes 3 faces similar refund requests, while Sector 117's Exquisite project sees significant dues.

news.title: Ultratech re-enters race to buy Orient Cement
news.para: UltraTech’s spokesperson was unavailable for comment. Deepak Khetrapal, MD and CEO of OCL, denied discussions were taking place and any talk of sale plans was a “figment of one’s imagination.”

news.title: India's most versatile Real Estate Marketing specialists eye robust growth!
news.para: In the last few months alone, Square One has rolled out powerful success stories in Pune with projects the likes of Envogue, Shubh Tristar and Majestique Evolvus.

news.title: Leasing of workspace in Jan-Jun up 29% to 33.54 million sq ft: Report
news.para: H1 2024 (January to June) marked the best-ever first half, with leasing volumes at 33.5 million sq ft, surpassing the previous highest H1 performance seen in 2019," the consultant highlighted.

news.title: Institutional investments in real estate up 20% in Apr-June: Colliers
news.para: Institutional investments in industrial & warehousing projects jumped sharply to USD 1,533.1 million during April-June 2024 from USD 133.9 million a year ago.

news.title: NCLAT to wait for lenders' decision on settlement offer from Supertech Realtors
news.para: A three-member NCLAT bench observed that Supertech Realtors submitted an one-time settlement (OTS), and the lead bank principally agreed with the proposal and the proposal is under consideration by the consortium of banks.

news.title: S&P cuts Sweden's SBB rating to selective default
news.para: SBB is at the centre of a Swedish property market bubble that began to unravel in 2022 when inflation and interest rates soared, triggering sharp cuts to its credit ratings and a plunge in its share price.

news.title: Andhra Pradesh CM directs officials to focus on sand availability
news.para: Due to the policies of the previous government (YSRCP), people are suffering from immense problems. Take measures to immediately resolve them," Naidu directed officials, according to an official press release.

news.title: AIIB to conduct survey for Madurai, Coimbatore metro projects
news.para: According to the recent budget announcement, Detailed Project Reports (DPRs) have been prepared for the metro rail projects. The Coimbatore project, covering Avinashi and Sathyamangalam Road, is estimated to cost Rs 10,740 crore.
